Key Match Events: New Zealand won by 5 wickets with 160 balls remaining
Trent Boult was named Player of the Match for his 3/37
Post-Match Reflections: Kusal Mendis expressed disappointment with his own performance but enjoyed the captaincy
Kane Williamson praised the team's performance and acknowledged the challenge of playing India in the semi-final
Trent Boult was pleased with his performance and looked forward to playing India in the semi-final
Rachin Ravindra expressed gratitude for the support and reflected on his journey to the team
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka's batting was a massive letdown according to Maharoof
New Zealand now have one leg in the semi-final with ten points and a high chance of playing India in the semi-final in Mumbai
